story.iWant: to view detailed information for a specific product
story.soThat: I can make an informed decision about a purchase

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Clicking on a product in the catalog navigates to a dedicated product detail page.
The product detail page displays the product's name, full description, price, real-time stock quantity, land of origin, and vitola (FR001, FR002).
The product detail page includes simplified, relatable language for taste/flavor descriptions (FR003).
The product detail page is responsive across mobile, tablet, and PC devices (NFR001).
